name: PeerTube
description: A plugin that adds PeerTube as a source
author: FUTO

authentication.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 12) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/120.0.6099.230 Mobile Safari/537.36

captcha.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 14) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/131.0.6778.200 Mobile Safari/537.36

settings.name: Home Feed
settings.description: Source and sorting for the home feed

settings.name: Content Source
settings.description: Current instance uses your configured server. Sepia Search aggregates all indexed PeerTube instances.

settings.name: Home Feed Sorting
settings.description: Best, Trending, and Hot require PeerTube v3.1.0+ (falls back to Newest on older instances).

settings.name: Home Filters
settings.description: Filter home feed by category and language. Multiple filters combine with OR logic. Leave empty to disable.

settings.name: Search Engine
settings.description: Current instance searches your server and its followed instances. Sepia Search searches all indexed PeerTube instances.

settings.name: Policy for sensitive content
settings.description: How to handle NSFW content across all feeds, searches, and recommendations.

settings.name: Allow Playing Sensitive Content
settings.description: Allow playback of sensitive content, including deep-linked videos.

settings.name: Report Views
settings.description: Send watch activity to instances to count views.

settings.name: Experimental
settings.description: Features that are still being tested and may not work as expected

settings.name: Browser Impersonation
settings.description: Impersonate a browser's TLS fingerprint to bypass bot detection (e.g. Cloudflare). Requires HttpImp.

settings.name: Cloudflare Captcha Support
settings.description: Prompt for captcha on Cloudflare-protected instances instead of failing silently.

settings.name: Search Suggestions
settings.description: Fetch suggestions from the search API as you type. Makes extra API requests which may increase instance load.
